name: Gayatri Mantra
sanskrit:
ॐ भूर्भुवः स्वः
तत्सवितुर्वरेण्यं
भर्गो देवस्य धीमहि
धियो यो नः प्रचोदयात्
transliteration:
Om Bhur Bhuvaḥ Swaḥ
Tat-savitur Vareñyaṃ
Bhargo Devasya Dhīmahi
Dhiyo Yo Naḥ Prachodayāt
meaning: We meditate on the divine light of the Sun, the source of all life and consciousness. May this divine light illuminate our minds and guide our thoughts toward truth and righteousness. We seek the blessings of the divine to awaken our inner wisdom and lead us from darkness to light.

name: Maha Mrityunjaya Mantra
sanskrit:
ॐ त्र्यम्बकं यजामहे
सुगन्धिं पुष्टिवर्धनम्
उर्वारुकमिव बन्धनान्
मृत्योर्मुक्षीय मामृतात्
transliteration:
Om Tryambakam Yajamahe
Sugandhim Pushtivardhanam
Urvarukamiva Bandhanan
Mrityor Mukshiya Mamritat
meaning: We worship the three-eyed Lord Shiva who is the destroyer of death and the giver of immortality. Just as a cucumber is freed from its bondage to the vine when ripe, may we be freed from the cycle of death and attain immortality.

name: Ganesha Mantra
meaning: I bow to Lord Ganesha, the remover of obstacles and the lord of beginnings. May all obstacles be removed from my path and may I be blessed with wisdom and success in all endeavors.

name: Krishna Mantra
meaning: I bow to the divine Lord Krishna, the son of Vasudeva. This sacred mantra invokes the presence of the Supreme Being who is the embodiment of love, compassion, and divine consciousness.

name: Durga Mantra
meaning: I bow to Goddess Durga, the invincible divine mother who protects her devotees from all evil forces. She is the embodiment of divine feminine power and the destroyer of negativity.

name: Lakshmi Mantra
meaning: I bow to Goddess Lakshmi, the divine mother of wealth and prosperity. She is the source of all abundance, material and spiritual, and blesses her devotees with fortune and well-being.

name: Saraswati Mantra
meaning: I bow to Goddess Saraswati, the divine mother of knowledge, arts, and wisdom. She is the source of all learning and creativity, blessing her devotees with intelligence and artistic abilities.

name: Hanuman Mantra
meaning: I bow to Lord Hanuman, the mighty devotee of Lord Rama. He is the embodiment of strength, courage, and unwavering devotion, protecting his devotees from all dangers and difficulties.
